title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Basic Radiation"", ca. 1984
medium: Black and color marking pens, brush and watercolor (?) on heavy white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black marking pen in margin, lower right:  "Basic Radiation Screen;" in margin, lower left:  6. [encircled]
description: Five panel screen on wheels.  Reading from left to right:  orange panel with circular cut out in middle; blue panel with triangle cut out and 1/2 cello-shaped cut out at right edge; yellow panel with saw tooth cut out along right edge; green panel with seven square cut outs along right edge; red panel with diamond cut out at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Basic Radiation"", ca. 1984.
ca. 1984. Black and color marking pens, brush and watercolor (?) on heavy white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-115.
